title: Can't connect to server
body: Anyone else unable to connect to server? Its extremely annoying.

replies.body: Can't connect to any server, lost LP.
Yeah super lame :( happened in a ranked game a bit ago and took my lp. So unfair
Trust me, if you're not a pro player or someone of value, they don't care about your LP. Happens to a lot of us and they just leave us there to rot.
Not true, support literally has no ability to adjust ranked stats.  Not joking when I say even attempting to do so could break the system, so it's not a matter of your skill level.

Hey guys, there is a live maintenance going on right now per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, but I do see your reports on reconnecting to games as well as to the client.  I'm reaching out to get more info, I'm not certain if this is due to maintenance or a potential ISP issues.  Hang tight!

It's not just you, the live maintenance just screwed me too, same problem " unable to connect to server, please check your internet connection and try to reconnect" Yet im able to run everything else that needs internet perfectly.
